snippet.title: The 7th Guest VR - Official Release Date Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description: The 7th Guest VR will be available on Steam, PS VR2, and Meta Quest. Check out the latest trailer for the upcoming mystery adventure game and get ready to explore the creepy mansion, solve puzzles, and uncover its dark secrets. The adventure game from the 90s is brought to life for VR. In The 7th Guest VR, six guests have been welcomed to the foreboding mansion. But something sinister is at play...
